title: *Sun-Drenched 1-Bedroom Apartment in a Luxury Amenities Building* 2005
posting_body: ['*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building* - Lots of Layouts Are Available', '*Sun-Drenched 1-Bedroom Apartment in a Luxury Amenities Building*', 'The pictures are showing a mix of the available layouts', '$2,900 Gross + 2 months free on a 14-month lease ($2,486 Net)', '*The Apartment Features:*', 'Queen-Size Bedroom / Bathroom with a Deep Soaking Tub / Spacious Living Space / AC Unit in Each Room / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows with Amazing City & Water Views / Great Direct Natural Light All Throughout the Apartment / Open Concept Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances including a Dishwasher / High Ceilings / Hardwood Floors /', '*The Building Features:*', "24-7 Doorman / Fitness Center & Yoga Studio / Cinema Screening Room / Game Room / Coffee Bar / Multiple Co-Working Spaces & Conference Rooms / Library Lounge / Kids' Playroom / Laundry Room (The Upper Levels Have Laundry in-Unit) /", 'Rooftop Lounge with Manhattan Skyline Views / Parking Garage* / Bike Room / Package Room / Elevators /', '*Free Shuttle Bus to the Nearby Train Stations is Available 7 Days a Week', '*Dog Walking, Dry Cleaning, & Apartment Cleaning Services Are Available', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $116,000+ (=40x times the monthly rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome! /', '"The Guarantors" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
